reasoning: Rare benign brain tumor with incidence of approximately 1-2 per million per year (0.1-0.2 per 100,000). Estimate based on published neurosurgical case series and population-based epidemiological studies. Limited data available; confidence capped at 0.55 due to reliance on hospital registry and case series data (Tier 2 sources) rather than population-based registries.
source: Compiled from neurosurgical literature and pituitary tumor epidemiology studies
